channel.title: Home on Sample Hugo Website
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Sample Hugo Website

item.title: About
item.description: Who this is for This sample site is for anyone who wants a minimal Hugo setup using Markdown content and a hand-rolled layout (no external theme required). What’s included A home page (content/_index.md) Three pages (content/about.md, content/services.md, content/contact.md) A menu defined in hugo.toml

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can replace this with your real contact info. Email: hello@example.org GitHub: https://github.com/example If you want a contact form, you’d typically integrate a form backend (since Hugo is static).

item.title: Services
item.description: Here are three example “services” sections to show typical Markdown formatting. 1) Static site setup We can structure content into pages and keep navigation consistent. 2) Content editing workflow Write in Markdown, preview locally, then deploy. 3) Performance-friendly output Hugo generates fast static HTML with minimal overhead.
